scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m "Web deployment update - $(date)" && git push
scripts.submit: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const app=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('app.json'));const v=app.expo.version.split('.');v[2]=parseInt(v[2])+1;app.expo.version=v.join('.');app.expo.ios.buildNumber='1';fs.writeFileSync('app.json',JSON.stringify(app,null,2));" && eas build --platform ios --profile production --auto-submit
scripts.build:on-real-device-and-increment: echo 'üîÑ Incrementing build number...' && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const app=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('app.json','utf8'));const current=app.expo.ios.buildNumber||'1';const next=(parseInt(current)+1).toString();app.expo.ios.buildNumber=next;fs.writeFileSync('app.json',JSON.stringify(app,null,2));console.log('‚úÖ Build number incremented from',current,'to',next);" && eas build --profile development --platform ios --clear-cache
scripts.submit-and-increment: echo 'üîÑ Incrementing build number...' && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const app=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('app.json','utf8'));const current=app.expo.ios.buildNumber||'1';const next=(parseInt(current)+1).toString();app.expo.ios.buildNumber=next;fs.writeFileSync('app.json',JSON.stringify(app,null,2));console.log('‚úÖ Build number incremented from',current,'to',next);" && eas submit --platform ios --latest
scripts.update-next: echo 'üì¶ Smart package update...' && pkill -f 'expo-cli' || true && rm -rf .expo && node ../../../libraries/orbit/scripts/utils/smart-npm-install.js @appsformankind/orbit && node ../../../libraries/orbit/scripts/utils/smart-npm-install.js @appsformankind/models && rm -rf .expo && npm i
scripts.update: npm run remove-app && echo 'üì¶ Smart package update...' && pkill -f 'expo-cli' || true && rm -rf .expo && node ../../../libraries/orbit/scripts/utils/smart-npm-install.js @appsformankind/orbit && node ../../../libraries/orbit/scripts/utils/smart-npm-install.js @appsformankind/models && rm -rf .expo && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.remove-app: rm -rf app && echo 'üóëÔ∏è  App directory removed successfully'
scripts.reset-cache: rm -rf .expo && rm -rf node_modules/.cache && npx expo start --clear --reset-cache
